tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
My daughter Nadia needed to see a dentist and we found this great doctor. Professional with children. She greeted Nadia with some toys. They played for some time. Then Nadia went to the dentist room with colorful pictures and a big TV screen on the wall. While the treatment was going on,  she was watching cartoons. It diverted her attention a lot. 
The doctor also specialises in conscious sedation in case a child doesn't coperate at all. 
The only thing Nadia needed was some kind of tranquilizer (sprayed to her nose) because she was getting restless towards the end. 
Otherwise,  the whole procedure was performed without any painkillers.
At the end,  Nadia got a gift from the dentist. 

She even asks me when we will go back again to the dentist 😂😂
I consider this to be a huge success because before she would not even open her mouth to the dentists.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This was my second time with her. I got my right lower wisdom extracted and stitched and right upper wisdom extracted. Oh my! She is a mother to my teeth and has magic in her hands!!! I stay in Gariahat but travelled all the way to new town just because I can’t trust anyone other than Dr Anita. Love how she passionately does her job. Can’t thank you enough doctor!!! **** ******* ** ******* ***** **** *️

review: *** ** ****** ******* ******* Great patient management. I had gone with my daughter for treatment of cavities. Dr Anita treated my daughter with a lot of patience and understanding. Gave a lot of time. I am totally satisfied and really happy with her treatment. For your child dental care Dr Anita Chauhan is the best option

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My son is 4.9 and suffering from multiple carries. He had a boil on the top left corner for which she said there is no medicine, we ll have to do RCT. And for rest of the damaged tooth she wanted to extract all the tooth install artificial teeth and then ll again extract them when the natural new ones ll b coming.      **** *** ****** ** ***** ***** *** ***********  ******** ***** *** **** ***** ****** ******* ** ***** ** ***** ******
reply_text:
Thanks for providing your feedback and letting us know about your opinion. First of all I seriously apologize that our conversation did not satisfy your expectations. Madam we set a high standard for ourselves and are truly sorry to hear from you. 
I must assure you that our patients happiness and wellbeing is our first priority. 
Coming to the issue, you said that your son had a boil on the top left corner of tooth. First of all you need to understand the cause of boil which is actually an abscess due to a grossly decayed left upper back tooth. This generally happens due to poor oral hygiene and oral care negligence. 
After seeing your older prescription from some other clinic you had visited it was clear that the child had already taken multiple course of antibiotics. And please understand that only giving medicine without treatment of the concerned tooth will not benefit the child. 
So the options left with us were either keep the tooth by doing pulpectomy but without crown as the tooth was in a very bad condition. By doing this the tooth can again develop an abscess. 
Moreover long standing grossly decayed tooth could result in an infectious insult to the permanent tooth bud which would cause hypomineralization of permanent enamel. The other option is remove the milk tooth and give a space maintainer. 
I have tried to explain you the case. Feel free to contact me anytime for any further discussion. Please reach me personally via email or phone and  I would be more than happy to discuss the issue at your earliest convenience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
